name: Cockville
description:
Congrats, you just inherited a farm and your hot neighbors will not let you be! Erotic hijinks ensue on your neverending quest to expand your farm!
Discover spicy romances and intertwining stories in this bizarrely relaxing farm simulator.
Things get spicy very fast in CockVille. Not only does Alex prefer getting laid to doing any farmwork, but all your neighbors are sexy men. Horny, lonely, and very excited to meet the new guy!
This gay adult game uses simple farm sim mechanics to guide you through steamy, sexy stories, each culminating in a high quality lewd photo for your collection.
Upgrade your fixer-upper into a profitable palace of organic produce as Alex takes every chance to set you up with new hunks passing by! Meet and seduce a harem of eager men! Perhaps you might even stumble upon them playing with each other - and they will always invite you to stay and join the party!
Get to know the guys and their unique interests and quirky personalities, then chat with them, flirt with them, and make your move whenever you find an opening. They will reward you with increasingly more revealing erotic photos. Each romance option has his own rewarding storyline which lets you collect nudes and build a beautiful loving neighborhood. Nurture your relationships with them to discover more about the men of CockVille, and provide them with your wonderful veggies and also a different kind of protein!
You won big, farmboy! Think you could handle an entire harem of horny booty?
● 8+ Unique Guys to meet and explore their stories● 80+ uncensored sex scenes and animations● Multiple choice conversation system● Relaxing, casual gameplay● Complex production line system with over 100 elements to manage● 3 ways to distribute goods
